SELECT t.id, t1.warehouse_code, t1.warehouse_name warehouseName, t.material_code materialCode, t2.NAME, t.num, t3.major_name majorName, t4.system_name systemName, t5.base_type_name baseTypeCodeName, d1.item_text typeName, t6.depart_name orgName, t2.specifications, t7.`name` manufactorCodeName, d3.item_text unit, t2.price FROM spare_part_stock t LEFT JOIN spare_part_stock_info t1 ON t.warehouse_code = t1.warehouse_code LEFT JOIN material_base t2 ON t.material_code = t2.CODE LEFT JOIN cs_major t3 ON t2.major_code = t3.major_code LEFT JOIN cs_subsystem t4 ON t2.system_code = t4.system_code LEFT JOIN material_base_type t5 ON t2.base_type_code = t5.base_type_code LEFT JOIN sys_depart t6 ON t6.id = t.org_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict AS dict1 ON dict1.dict_code = 'material_type' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item AS d1 ON d1.item_value = t2.type AND dict1.id = d1.dict_id LEFT JOIN cs_manufactor t7 ON t7.id = t2.manufactor_code LEFT JOIN sys_dict AS dict3 ON dict3.dict_code = 'materian_unit' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item AS d3 ON d3.item_value = t2.unit AND dict3.id = d3.dict_id
WHERE t.del_flag =0
and t.material_code like concat('%', #{stock.materialCode}, '%')
and t2.`name` like concat('%', #{stock.name}, '%')
and t2.type = #{stock.type}
and t3.major_code like concat('%', #{stock.majorCode}, '%')
and t4.system_code like concat('%', #{stock.systemCode}, '%')
and t5.base_type_code like concat('%', #{stock.baseTypeCode}, '%')
and t.org_id not in (#{stock.orgId})
and t.num <> 0
and t1.warehouse_code = #{stock.warehouseCode}
order by t.create_time desc
